title: Beer gardens in Japan and Okinawa
text:
Beer gardens in Japan and Okinawa Matt Millham/Stars and Stripes Published: August 31, 2015 
OMOHARA BEER FOREST BY YONA YONA BEER KITCHEN (Tokyo): Through Sept. 6, 5-10 p.m. weekdays, noon-10 p.m. weekends; enjoy craft beers on the rooftop of Tokyo Plaza Omotesando, three-minute walk from JR Harajuku Station or Meiji Jingu Station on Chiyoda Line; 03-3497-0418. 
BEER GARDEN IN ARK HILLS (Tokyo): Through Sept. 6, 5-10 p.m. weekdays, 11 a.m.-10 p.m. weekends; enjoy selected craft beers and barbecue food; Ark Karajan Place, one-minute walk from Roppongi 1-chome Station on Oedo-Line or nine-minute walk from Akasaka Station on Chiyoda-Line; 03-3496-1988. 
BEER FEST IN THE SKY AT HUIS TEN BOSCH (Nagasaki prefecture): through Sept. 6, 11 a.m.-10 p.m.; enjoy beers from Germany, Belgium, Denmark, the Netherlands and more; 0570-064-110. 
THE BEER TERRACE AT TACHIKAWA WASHINGTON HOTEL (western Tokyo): through Sept. 12, Tue.-Sat., 6-9 p.m.; you-can-drink for 2,500 yen for two hours, along with a la carte menus for 4,000-5,000 yen at a roof top terrace; five-minute walk from JR Tachikawa Station; 042-526-6666. 
BEER GARDEN PORT GARDEN TERRACE AT TOKYO DOME: Through Sept. 13, 4-10 p.m. weekdays, noon-10 p.m. weekends & holidays, open until 9 p.m. Fri.-Sun. in June; enjoy Belgium beer along with side dishes at open-air terrace at MeetPort Area of Tokyo Dome; 03-5805-3160; . 
ROPPONGI BEAR GARDEN (Tokyo): Through Sept. 26, 10 a.m.-7 p.m.; enjoy beers, cocktails or wine with barbecue at a roof top of Roppongi Roi Building, 5th floor, five-minute walk from Roppongi Station on Hibiya Line; 03-3478-1818. 
FOREST BEER GARDEN (Tokyo): Through Sept. 26, 5-10 p.m.; beer & barbecue, located close to JR Shinanomachi Station and the Jingu Stadium; 4,100 yen for all-you-can drink & eat for men, 3,800 yen women for two hours; 03-5411-3715. 
HIROSHIMA MTSUKOSHI BEER GARDEN (Hiroshima prefecture): Through Sept. 26, 5:30-10 p.m.; enjoy all-you-can-eat and drink at rooftop terrace of Hiroshima Mitsukoshi Department Store, one-minute walk from Ebisucho Streetcar Stop on Hiroden; 3,100 yen men, 2,900 yen women; 0120-44-2741. 
BEER GARDEN BREEZE & GREENERY AT TOKYO DOME: Through Sept. 27, 6-10 p.m. weekdays, 11 a.m.-10 p.m. weekends & holidays; enjoy all-you-can eat and drink two hours before or after watching games at Tokyo Dome, with three varieties of draft beer, soft drinks, and 20 varieties of food; near Tokyo Dome Gate 22, 3,900 yen. 
KIRIN YOKOHAMA BEER VILLAGE (Kanagawa prefecture): Through Sept. 27, 3-10 p.m. weekdays, 11 a.m.-10 p.m. weekends; fresh beers brewed in the factory & barbecue at an open-air restaurant, 10-minute walk from Namamugi Station on Keikyu Line; ; 3,300 yen men, 3,100 yen women 3-6:30 p.m. weekdays; 045-503-8250. 
GINZA SKY BEER TERRACE (Tokyo): through Sept. 30, 5-10 p.m.; commemorating 50 th anniversary since the opening of Kotsu Kaikan Building in 1965, a landmark in Ginza; all-you-can eat and drink for 4,800 yen or 6,400 yen for two hours along with live music; one-minute walk from JR Yurakucho Station; 03-3212-2776. 
TACHIKAWA BEER GARDEN SOLARE (western Tokyo): Through Sept. 30, noon-midnight; all-you-can-eat and drink for 3,500 yen at rooftop terrace of Tachikawa LX Bldg., a two-minute walk from JR Tachikawa Station; 050-5265-0310. 
BEER GARDEN AT MOUNT TAKAO (Tokyo): Through Oct. 15, 3-9 p.m. weekdays, 1-9 p.m. weekends; enjoy all-you-can-drink beer, cocktails, sake, soft drinks and more along with foods in two hours; 3,500 yen men ages 16+, 3,300 yen women ages 16+, 2,500 yen middle-school students, 1,500 yen children, 500 yen infants; Mount Takao Station (cable car); 042-665-9943. 
BEER TERRACE HIBIYA SAROH (Tokyo): all year; 11:30 a.m.-10 p.m.; enjoy beers from Germany, Belgium and other countries along with food at the terrace surrounded by the greens at the Hibiya Park, two-minute walk from Hibiya Station on Hibiya and Chiyoda-Lines or five-minute walk from JR Yurakucho Station; 03-3591-2411. 
FUSSA NO BIRUGOYA - BEER RESTAURANT (Tokyo): all year; enjoy local craft beers along with original brewed sake, wine and more; 15-minute walk from JR Haijima Station; 042-553-0171. 
KING OF THE PIRATES AQUA CITY ODAIBA (Tokyo): all year; all-you-can eat and drink for 3,500-4,500-5,500 yen at the terrace of the pirateâ€™s ship while viewing Rainbow Bridge and Odaiba areas; one-minute walk from Daiba Station on Yurikamome Line or five-minute walk from Tokyo Teleport on Rinkai Line; 03-3599-1225. Okinawa 
LAGUNA GARDEN HOTEL POOLSIDE BBQ & BEER GARDEN: Through Sept. 30, 6-10 p.m.; enjoy barbecue and beer for 3,333 yen adults, 1,436 yen children; all you-can drink for 1,436 yen adults, 477 yen children for two hours; or all-you-can drink and eat barbecue for 4,630 yen until Aug. 31, along with live music performances at Lagna Garden Hotel Beer Garden; 098-897-2121. 
OKINAWA MIYAKO HOTEL SKY BEER FESTA: Through Oct. 10, 6-9:30 p.m. Fri. & Sat.; enjoy all you-can-eat and drink at 3,700 yen at a rooftop terrace of Okinawa Miyako Hotel; 098-887-1112. Join the conversation and share your voice.
